comment: HANDS DOWN, the best professor I ever had. If you are in the realm of communication, take this professor for as many classes as you can. She cares about her students and their lives and success, not just in the classroom, but outside as well. She makes sure you are prepared for entering the working field and gives fun and relevant classwork

Professor Davis was the hands-down greatest professor I had in college! Professor Davis assigns you with enjoyable projects that'll leave you with an immense feeling of success when you're done. Her valuable feedback will help you convert weaknesses into strengths and make your strengths become your elevator pitch. A great inspiration for students.

Ashli was hands down the most helpful, inspiring instructor I've ever had. The assignments were challenging, but extremely beneficial. I have several samples for my portfolio now and Ashli has continued to offer her time and help 10 months after I graduated. She truly cares about her students and is a valuable connection to have post-college.

Professor Davis is extremely knowledgeable.  She does give out a good bit of work, but every assignment is one that will prepare you for the future. She will expect a lot of you, but that is only because she knows you are capable.  Take her if you want to learn Public Relations.

Ms. Davis is one of the best professors I have encountered at KSU. Having been here five years, this means a lot. She cares about the long-term success of the students and ensures that you will have the tools you need to learn PR Strategies and Tactics as well as the tools for success post-graduation. Take this class- you will not regret it!
